game.master
Class GameMaster

java.lang.Object
  game.master.GameMaster
All Implemented Interfaces:
Game
public class GameMaster
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game

This class is responsible to start the Game using all the classes needed from the Game Model. Meaning this is the class the Controller will call to connect it with the view.

Author:
Author
